channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

item.title: Report X-2023100547
item.description:
Report X-2023100547

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-28
  • City: BUFFALO
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During Preload sort on 09/28/23, a Hazmat package inside delivery vehicle was discovered by driver to be damaged and leaking contents inside vehicle. Driver alerted ops manager who then called QA to inspect package. QA discovered a one gallon jug of Zep Industrial Purple Degreaser leaking contents from loose cap inside package DescribePack: Bottle of Zep Industrial Purple Degreaser leaking contents from loose cap DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA placed damaged package in a red plastic Fedex Ground Hazmat bin with plastic liner and staged in Hazmat cage on site. Leaking degreaser cleaned with absorbent and neutralizer powder

item.title: Report X-2023100247
item.description:
Report X-2023100247

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-08T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-25
  • City: LONG ISLAND CITY
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was found at the unload area after the outbound shift and there is some spillage on the exterior of the box. Upon opening the package there is one broken glass bottle of ethyl acetate. Kitty litter was used to contain the spillage. DescribePack: The bottom of the package is opened and one glass bottle is broken. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Kitty litter was used to contain the spillage.

item.title: Report X-2023090800
item.description:
Report X-2023090800

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-04T06:23:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-19
  • City: YORKTOWN HGTS
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER DISCOVERED DAMAGED PACKAGE. PACKAGE WAS NOT SPILLING OUT OF THE CARTON ALL LEAKAGE WAS CONFINDED TO THE BROKEN PAIL AND CARTON. RESPONDER TOOK PACKAGE FROM DISCOVERY LOCATION AND RETURNED TO DMP FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023090772
item.description:
Report X-2023090772

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-04T06:23:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-15
  • City: LATHAM
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE ON THE ORANGE BELT, RESPONDED TO THE LEAKING PACKAGE WEARING APPROPRIATE PPE GEAR INCLUDING SILVER SHIELD GLOVE LINERS, IDENTIFIED THE LEAKING PACKAGE AS HAZMAT BASED ON FLAMABLE LIQIUID 3 DIAMOND LABLE AND IDENTIFIED THE CONTENTS AS ACETONITRILE, PLACED LEAKING PACKAGE IN SPILL TRAY LINED WITH GREEN DMP BAG CONTAINING ZEP ABSORBANT, AND TRANSPORTED LEAKING PACKAGE IN SPILL TRAY TO DMP FOR PROCESSING

item.title: Report X-2023090171
item.description:
Report X-2023090171

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-04T06:23:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-06
  • City: GARDEN CITY
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Package was taken to a manager when at our Garden City, NY when an employee stated they heard what sound like metal cans inside of a FedEx pak. When the package was opened 2 spray cans of Dupli-Color High Performance Textured Metallic Coat. An sds of the commody shows the shipment is regulated for travel. There was no markings nor labels on the package to indicate dangerous goods were inside. Package has been held at station pending disposition.
